body_html:
If you would like to plot time stamp on tensorboard, you can use include it in tf.summary
For example,
summary_writer = tf.summary.FileWriter()

summary = tf.Summary()
summary.value.add(tag='xxx', simple_vale=yyy)
summary_writer.add_summary(summary, global_step)
body_text:
If you would like to plot time stamp on tensorboard, you can use include it in tf.summary
For example,
summary_writer = tf.summary.FileWriter()
summary = tf.Summary()
summary.value.add(tag='xxx', simple_vale=yyy)
summary_writer.add_summary(summary, global_step)
body:
If you would like to plot time stamp on tensorboard, you can use include it in tf.summary
For example,
summary_writer = tf.summary.FileWriter()

summary = tf.Summary()
summary.value.add(tag='xxx', simple_vale=yyy)
summary_writer.add_summary(summary, global_step)
